title: Task of the teacher (TEFC)
creator_credit: Lorna Ridgeway, Dan Douglas and Stockwell College of Education
brief_description: The variety of functions the teacher performs are outlined. The different approaches necessary for various types of schools are shown - traditional to open plan.
